parameters.name: AuthParameters
parameters.description: The parameters that are configured for authentication.

parameters.name: ConnectionName
parameters.description: The name of the connection that you want to update. The name must be 2 to 127 characters in length.

parameters.name: Description
parameters.description: The description of the connection. The description can be up to 255 characters in length.

parameters.name: NetworkParameters
parameters.description: The parameters that are configured for the network.
